title: Honey soaked almond cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '225g soft unsalted butter', '225g caster sugar', '1 lemon, finely zested', '225g ground almonds', '3 large eggs', '125g fine cornmeal or polenta', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '100g runny honey', 'For the compote', '500g rhubarb, chopped', '3 oranges, zested and segmented', '50g caster sugar', 'Creme fraiche, to taste']
